ygData.subject: MPI and Python extensions to HyperNEAT C++ are now optional
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey all, Per request, I added some flags to the cmake script that lets you customize whether or not to compile MPI & Python extensions.  This reduces compile

Hey all,

Per request, I added some flags to the cmake script that lets you=

customize whether or not to compile MPI & Python extensions.  This
reduces=
 compile time for people who do not want MPI and/or Python support.

I didn=
't change the version number, so the new version can still be
downloaded us=
ing the 2.5 download link.
